name: SGD102 Task 3: Platformer Prototype
description:
This was a game I made for my Introduction to Games Programming class at uni. It's a small platformer based around collecting all the coins and finding all the gems. It has a jump boost powerup. Most noises were made by me.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Spacebar for jump

R to reset at last checkpoint

E to interact when prompted

ALT + F4 to quit
